text: Ability: Tamer of Tigers and Leopards
Follow me, men! Let us dismantle the enemy formation!
The world can live without Cao Hong, but not without you!
Chew up the chaff and spit them out, and let the survivors display why they are the best of the best.
It is time for years of hard training to finally pay off!
By utilising long forgotten secrets, a path to victory is revealed.
Even as Wang Lang lets out a pained cry and falls off his steed, his men are invigorated to continue the struggle anew.

Disrupt the tactics of the enemy generals, and turn their strategems back against them!
